original_title: 一緒に住んで、一緒に耐えて、性欲も恋心も我慢の限界…1ヶ月間の“禁欲＆同棲”生活の果て互いの体液絡み合う性交
overview: Jun moves to live with a pro JAV actor, and they must endure sexual abstinence together. Until they just don’t and blow each other brains.
title: Living Together, Enduring Together, Sexual Desire and Love Reaches the Limit of Endurance… One Month of ‘Abstinence & Living Together’
